body.p: To his excellency the Governor of Kentucky your petitioners would respectfully request that you remit a Judgment rendered at the last april Octo. Term of the Hart Equity and Criminal ^court^ for $200 against Thomas Hodge A. C. Murray and Alfred Murray in favour of the Commonwealth upon a forfeited Bail Bond for the appearance of Richard Murray on a charge of having committed a breach of the peace and also to remit a Judgement against Coleby Shipp ^$100^ rendered at the same term in favour of the Commonwealth upon a forfeited bail bond for the appearance of Richard Shipp in said Court on a charge of for an assault and balling
In the opinion of your petitioners these cases present claims upon the executive clemency
